summary: A recreation of Aribeth de Tylmarande's sword from Neverwinter Nights.
descriptionHtml:
A recreation of the sword wielded by Aribeth de Tylmarande from Neverwinter Nights. Comes as a Shortsword and a Greatsword. 

Can be crafted using the Elven smithing perk and moonstone/quicksilver, under the Elven category at a forge, or can be found in Shimmermist Cave (see screenshots for location). Has stats similar to Glass swords. 

If you have any problems post a comment and I'll see what I can do. 

All copyright for the sword design etc. belong to Bioware and Atari. 

----- 

Mods used in screenshots: 
Realvision ENB 
HD Official textures 
Plate Armour Plus: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=120254896 
Ponytail: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=131617688&searchtext=ponytail
author: Amorbis - Spectravideo
